body:
Hi Andy,


This seems as good a time as any. I put together a blog post about Glass 
in Radiance <http://modsimvis.blogspot.com/>. I need to add some 
information about the optics2rad script but have not gotten around to 
it. But it may be a helpful resource as the topic (glaze) does seem to 
come up.


Best,


-Jack




Jack de Valpine
President


Visarc Incorporated
www.visarc.com


channeling technology for superior design and construction
